mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.merchant_name AS "merchantName", a.seal_account_id AS "sealAccountId", a.seal_type AS "sealType", a.seal_data AS "sealData", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO electronics_seal_data( id, merchant_id, merchant_name, seal_account_id, seal_type, seal_data, create_time, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{merchantId}, #{merchantName}, #{sealAccountId}, #{sealType}, #{sealData}, #{createTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE electronics_seal_data SET merchant_id = #{merchantId}, merchant_name = #{merchantName}, seal_account_id = #{sealAccountId}, seal_type = #{sealType}, seal_data = #{sealData}, create_time = #{createTime}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
